alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Essex; King and Queen (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 5:42PM EDT until June 30 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern King and Queen County in east central Virginia... East central Caroline County in north central Virginia... Northwestern Essex County in east central Virginia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 542 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bowling Green, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern King and Queen, east central Caroline and northwestern Essex Counties, including the following locations... Supply, Sparta, Gether, Central Point and Salvia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
